message: I propose a fair split. You get 10%, and I get 90%. Let's get this over with!
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve more for my efforts. What do you say?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I won't accept anything less than half. This inflation is getting out of control!
I'm not budging on the numbers, but I'm willing to make a concession on the split. Take it or leave it!
I'm willing to go down to 40% for you, but this is my final offer. I'm not going to let you take advantage of inflation!
